official_title: To require the adjustment of the conversion factors for anesthesia services under part B of the medicare program.
short_title: Medicare Anesthesiology Reimbursement Correction Act of 1989

summary.text: Medicare Anesthesiology Reimbursement Correction Act of 1989 - Directs the Secretary of Health and Human Services to adjust the factors used in determining payment amounts for anesthesia services under part B (Supplementary Medical Insurance) of title XVIII (Medicare) of the Social Security Act so that any variations among localities in such factors reflect only variations in malpractice insurance costs and significant variations in other costs of practice among such localities.

titles.title: Medicare Anesthesiology Reimbursement Correction Act of 1989
To require the adjustment of the conversion factors for anesthesia services under part B of the medicare program.
